-e ---

𓉔 ḫ ה ƕ ḥ ẖ h₁ h₂ h₃ Ḫ =: KH
𓉔 hut house heim hall
𓎛 Ḫ ḫ ḥ
𒄩 ᴿḪa >
𒄷 ḫū HU 𓅱 Huhn
𒄭 Hel < Sol < 𒄭 ŠAR₂
ה ha < the article

H is the final destination (before aeiou => ø) of many sound change erosions over time,
see x, ch, sh, s, g, d and p>ph>h

𐋏 CARIAN LETTER E₂
𒂊 E < 𒂍 É < HEim < Kammer
𒂊 E < 𒂍 É < hall < calla (street, saloon) 𓉔

𒂊𒆗𒇻 ʱe-kal-lu 𐎅𐎋𐎍 hkl /hêkal/ “palace” 𓉐
𒂊𒁲𒋗 ᵏe-de-šu חָדָשׁ khadásh getāzā ताज़ा керда kerdas “new”
